product.title: SSGTI - Stock Trader
product.description: This product allow users to use forum's virtual money to invest in stock with real stock rates. They'll be able to buy & sell at market values using "Yahoo Stock Quotes".

SSGTI - Stock Trader - [ Check & Corect Money DB Field ]

SSGTI - Stock Trader - [ Cache Templates ]

phrasetype.name: Permissions
phrasetype.phrase: Allowed StocksIf you wish, you can set certain stocks to be allowed for trading & investments for this user group users. Please enter those allowed stocks' symbols separated by spaces.

Can Obtain Custom Trader NameUsers using "Stock Trader" supposed to be "Traders", you may want to allow each trader to have his custom "Trader Name" or "Trading Mark". Do you want to allow them to do so?

Can View Stock Trader Can this user group users view & participate in the "Stock Trader" or not. This is a global switch control permission for this user group, if "yes" then they will be able to view & trade with stocks, otherwise they won't be able to do so.
Capital Gains TaxWhen users sell stocks, a percentage (0-100) will be levied on profits as "Capital Gains Tax". Specify that percentage here.

Purchase Flat Rate CommissionUsers will be charged a certain flat rate for each purchase they made as a commission. Setting this to '10' means that an additional value '10' will be added to user's invoice, setting it to '0' means that there is no flat rate commission of stocks purchases.

Purchase Commission PercentUsers will be charged a certain percentage of each purchase they made as a commission. Setting this to '2' means that an additional value of 2% of the total purchase value will be added to user's invoice, setting it to '0' means that there is no percentage commission of stocks purchases.

Sales Flat Rate CommissionUsers will be charged a certain flat rate for each sale they made as a commission. Setting this to '10' means that an additional value '10' will be deducted from user's income, setting it to '0' means that there is no flat rate commission of stocks sales.

Sales Commission PercentUsers will be charged a certain percentage of each sale they made as a commission. Setting this to '2' means that an additional value of 2% of the total sale value will be deducted from user's income, setting it to '0' means that there is no percentage commission of stocks sales.

Exchange RateInvestments in stocks done in USD. This exchange rate determines how much your board's points are worth in USD. A value of '0.5' means that '1 point' in your board is worth '$0.5 USD', and a value of '2' means that '1 point' in your board is worth '$2 USD'.

Note: Since your board's points can't be decimal in most cases, then after calculating the total value of investment, if the final value is fractional, it will be approximated to the nearest upper integer number (in case of buying stocks), and it will be approximated to the nearest lower integer number (in case of selling stocks).

Instant-Invest-OrderWhen users have bought stocks and hold them in there deposit, they'll be able to paste a price to sell their stocks automatically when the stock price reaches that specific "barrier". (one order refers to one company, not for all at once)
The system will execute this process when the refreshed stock-prices are over the pasted barrier.

Example: The user bought 150 CITIGROUP stocks at $5,00 and add a instant-invest-order (for CITIGROUP) by pasting $6,50. CITIGROUP stocks now indeed raises over this barrier. The system now refreshes a bit later and the price update is now at $6,70. The User's stocks now automatically get sold for this price, since it passed the barrier of $6,50. But if the stocks doesn't raise to reach that price barrier ($6,50), the order will not be executed. This is opposite to the "Stop-Lose-Order"
Investment Time RequirementHow long users should hold onto purchased stocks before selling (in days).
Maximum Shares Per StockUsers are allowed to have X shares per stock (company) investment in the same time, you've the ability to limit that X limit from here.
Maximum InvestmentsUsers are allowed to have investments in X various companies at the same time, you've the ability to limit that X limit from here.

Social ParticipationShould users of this user group be included in the global top-list or not? Should their activity be seen within "Spy Eye" or not? Should they be included in any social or global activity or not?
Spy Eye AccessCheck "Yes" if you wish to allow users to have access to "Spy Eye". Spy Eye: is a logging system that displays all traders activity all over the forum.

Excepted User GroupIf this permission is "Yes", then this user group's users will be excepted from the limits of the "Available Stocks". They will be able to invest in any stock that's already permitted as "Global Stocks" or "Specialized to their User Group" in addition to any other stock available via the source (Yahoo Finance Currently).

Stop-Loss-Order When users have bought stocks and hold them in there deposit, they'll be able to paste a price to sell their stocks automatically when the stock price reaches that specific "barrier". (one order refers to one company, not for all at once)
The system will execute this process when the refreshed stock-prices are below the pasted barrier.

Example: The user bought 150 CITIGROUP stocks at $5,00 and add a stop-loss-order (for CITIGROUP) by pasting $4,50. CITIGROUP stocks now indeed fall below this barrier. The system now refreshes a bit later and the price update is now at $4,20. The User's stocks now automatically get sold for this price, since it passed the barrier of $4,50. But if the stocks rise and don't fall down to the value the user has pasted ($4,50), the order will not be executed.

phrasetype.name: GLOBAL
phrasetype.phrase: Error Indication (returned for symbol changed / invalid)

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Choose whether the product "SSGTI - Stock Trader" is active or not.

Cached data for used stocks becomes old/useless as the market move, so you've to update your cached data regularly. How many minutes do you wish to mark your cached data as valid for use? (After that period, data will be re-cached)
Note: "0" means real time values, that means the system will run caching process as soon as it's possible even it's multiple times per second. NOT RECOMMENDED

The text that is presented when the Stock Trader is closed.

Note: as an administrator, you will be able to see the Stock Trader as usual, even when you have turned it off to the public.
Reason For Turning Stock Trader Off

You can specify certain users to be excluded from using the "Stock Trader" regardless of their user group. If you wish to do so, then please enter those users' IDs here in this setting (separate multiple IDs by comma ',').

You can change the default file name of the "Stock Trader" to whatever you wish. Please note that you've to change it's name here in this setting & also change it physically through FTP or hosting control panel. Note: Just enter the file name without any extension.

Where do you need to display link for the "Stock Trader" in the navigation bar within forums? You've multiple automatic options & you've the ability to do it manually. If you need it auto, then choose your preferred position from these options.

Where do you need to display link for the "Stock Trader" in the "Quick Links" Menu within forums? You've multiple automatic options & you've the ability to do it manually. If you need it auto, then choose your preferred position from these options.
Which money field in your database that you wish to use in this system, you've to use a valid money/points field that already exists in your users table. (Default: 'reputation')
You've the ability to choose which navigation blocks should appear in the navigation side bar, please check needed blocks.
If you don't Omit "Losing Sales Commissions", some losing sales cases may becomes negative. How to act with such cases!?
On Negative Sale Action: What to do!?
Some stocks may fall down to low value levels, so users may loss there investments. If so, what to do with the "Sales Commissions", do you want to omit commissions on losing sales?
On Losing Sales: Omit Sales Commissions

You can specify which stocks to be available & allowed for users to trade & invest in. This is a global setting that if leaved empty, it means that all stocks are allowed; If it has specific values, then it means it's limited to those specified stocks defined here. Note: This setting can be overridden by specific user groups permissions; If there's specific user group value for the "Allowed Stocks" then this setting has no effect on those user groups. Please enter allowed stock symbols separated by spaces.
You may wish to change the stock trader's title to something else, here it is your ability to do so :).

This page variable setting isn't recommended to be changed in most cases, it's just for exceptional cases. By the way, it's only for determining URL format in some places within forums such as "Editing Stock Trader Options" in the User Control Panel (EX: "profile.php?do=stocktrader").
Note: this value should be SHORT/LOWERCASE/ALPHABETICAL WITHOUT ANY SPACES OR SPECIAL CHARACTERS.

setting.defaultvalue:
Sorry, the stock trader is unavailable at the moment while we are testing some functionality.

We will be back soon...
